titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1996, the duty on certain chemicals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 8/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on: (1) 2-phosphono-butane-1,2,4-tricarboxylic acid and sodium salts; (2) p-aminoazo-benzene-3,4-disulfonic acid, monosodium salt and disodium salt; (3) n-butylisocyanate (NBI); and (4) cyclohexyliso-cyanate (CHI).
